user.title: Welcome to intuiHEMS

auto_detect.title: Auto-Detect Energy Sensors
auto_detect.description: IntuiTherm can automatically detect your battery, solar, and house load sensors from the Home Assistant Energy Dashboard. Click Submit to start auto-detection, or click Skip to configure manually.

review.title: Review Detected Sensors
review.description: Review the automatically detected sensors below. You can change any selection or leave fields blank if not applicable. These sensors help IntuiTherm optimize your battery schedule.
